name: Cirno's Tan Plan
description:
This is a game for Touhou Station Game Jam 2021.

Cirno believes that if she gets tanned, she will be strong as she was during the events of Touhou 16. Unfortunately, she appears to have confused cause and effect... nonetheless, she want to get tanned fast, so she sets out on a quest to best the fieriest foes there are. Wait, isn't this more like getting singed?

Cirno's Tan Plan is a boss rush platformer with three different bosses to fight. You can graze against fire bullets increase Cirno's tan, which, through a placebo effect, increases her attack power. You can also create an ice platform to stand on or block bullets with, however fire will melt it instantly.

This is a derivative work of Touhou Project. Touhou Project and associated characters are property of Team Shanghai Alice / ZUN.
